transcript.text: how do you feel to say goodbye to those
characters and the people you work with
for almost 10 years on the gun of the
galaxy universe well I'm not really
saying goodbye to the actors because
they're such close friends of mine I
talked to Chris Pratt a couple times a
week I talked to Pam Clementi of almost
every day she sends me cat videos I talk
to Karen all the time so they're really
in my brothers and the movies so I
talked to the people a lot I plan on
working with all of them again I'm
saying goodbye to them in the guardians
but I'm not really saying goodbye to
them but I am saying goodbye to the
characters and that is difficult I love
rocket I love all the characters but I
do feel like we fulfilled their this
part of their story and that feels
really good so I mostly just feel good
that we gave them the ending of the
story that they deserved and treated
them with dignity and didn't screw it up
too bad
